ussr.comm
Interface Transmitter

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericTransmitter, IRTransmitter, RadioTransmitter, WiredTransmitter
public interface Transmitter

A device that can transmit packets to some receiver device. A transmitter device uses a specific transmission type.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI

Method Summary
 boolean canSendTo(Receiver receiver)
          Test whether this transmitter can transmit to (is within range of) the designated receiver device
 PhysicsEntity getHardware()
          Get a reference to the simulated hardware entity that represents the transmission device

          Get the transmission type implemented by the transmitter

          Send a data packet on the transmission device

          Counts the number of communication channels that are within communication range
 

Method Detail

send

void send(Packet packet)
Send a data packet on the transmission device

Parameters:

canSendTo

boolean canSendTo(Receiver receiver)
Test whether this transmitter can transmit to (is within range of) the designated receiver device

Parameters:
receiver - the receiver device for which to test reception capability
Returns:
true if the receiver device can receive transmissions from this device, false otherwise

Counts the number of communication channels that are within communication range
